item.title: Nasadiya Sukta RV 10.129
item.description: Rig Veda Mandal 10 Sukta 129 (RV 10.129) Rishi: Prajapati Parameshthi Devata: Bhavavritam Translated by: Alamabayana The Rig Veda is the oldest surviving literature in the Sanskrit tradition.
